title: SCRAMBLE
description: Shuffle the items in the current batch and select one at random.
syntax: SCRAMBLE(object) -> same data type as object

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: Object whose content will be scrambled.

examples:
SCRAMBLE(FirstName) 
-- Returns the FirstName of a random record within the execution batch.

tips.text: Using SCRAMBLE or RANDOMIZE in production will cause an exception when saving or executing the mapping.
